name: Les LeVeque
biography:
Les LeVeque is an artist who works with electronic media and lives in New York City. Recently he has been making short videos and video installations where Hollywood movies are transformed into a sensuous hallucinatory unveiling of repressed representations. Screenings of his experimental videos include: The New York Video Festival, Pandemonium Festival of the Moving Image, The Sundance Film Festival, Festival International Nouveau Cinema Nouveaux Medias, Viennale Vienna International Film Festival, the San Francisco International Film Festival, the 2000 Whitney Biennial and the Pompidou Center.
